Posts.Content: Feb 21, 2008 02:02AM jenninerena wrote: Ila, I had my lumpectomy March 07, started my 6 rounds of chemo May 07, and finished my radiation November 07.  I did have my first mammogram this month and did not experience any soreness.  I wouldn't worry, our breast has been through allot up to this point.  My tech did tell me that even though you looked healed on the outside, we are still not completely healed in the inside.  However, your doctor is the best one to answer any questions you may have.  Good luck, Jennine
Posts.Title: soreness after radiation and mamogram Ila NONE

Posts.Content: Jan 12, 2008 04:39PM jenninerena wrote: Joni, believe it or not I found my bra at Kmart.  I hope you do well with your radiation.  I was very lucky, I never blisted or had my skin become sore.  Jennine
